We are delighted to welcome you to the upcoming meeting of the ICES Working Group Fisheries Acoustics Science and Technology (WGFAST), which will be held from **8 to 11 April 2025** at the Marine and Freshwater Research Institute headquarters at Fornub√∫√∞ir 5 in Hafnarfj√∂r√∞ur, Iceland.

The meeting will include **3 main sessions**:

\- **Session 1**: Acoustic characterization of marine organisms.

\- **Session 2**: Acoustic methods to characterize populations, ecosystems, habitat, and behaviour.

\- **Session 3**: Emerging technologies.


Additionally, there are **3 WGFAST workshops/side meetings** are planned prior to the main meeting (April 6‚Äì7, 2025):

\- **Workshop 1**: Getting started with Git, Python, and Echopype-related tools.


\- **Workshop 2**: Global Assessment of Acoustic Target Strength and Frequency Response(GOAT).


\- **Workshop 3**: Open-source fish and plankton acoustic scattering model.
